name: dayOfWeekAsString
description: Determines the day of the week as a string from 1-7

params.name: dayOfWeek
params.description:
Only values from 1 to 7 are valid.
Week starting with 1 for Sunday and ends with 7 for Saturday:
	- 1 = Sunday 
	- 2 = Monday 
	- 3 = Tuesday 
	- 4 = Wednesday 
	- 5 = Thursday 
	- 6 = Friday 
	- 7 = Saturday

params.name: locale
params.description: Locale to use instead of the default JVM locale.

coldfusion.notes:
CF2018: Renamed parameter `day_of_week` to `dayofweek`. 
 CF8: Added `locale` parameter. 
 CFMX7: Changed behavior. The returned string is now in the language of the current locale.
